fields.title: Inline Edit: Allow to edit code directly in browser
fields.body:
Ticket edit represents modification of ticket on special ref. There can be only one ticket edit per ticket per user.

Modifications operations are:

* change file that was already changed in ticket
* add new file that exists or not in the repository
* delete file
* restore deleted file

Ticket edit operations are:

* create ticket edit
* delete ticket edit
* publish ticket edit, e. g. create new patch set of the ticket with content of ticket edit commit
* compare changes made in ticket edit
